binanceDescription: To continue working, you need to set up a connection to the Huobi.com Api server To do this, go to the Huobi.com Api settings by clicking the settings button below and specify: Api Key and Api Secret.
binanceErrorKey: You have not provided Binance Api Key
binanceErrorSecret: You have not provided Binance Secret
incorrectBinanceData: You entered incorrect Binance Api Key or Binance Secret
huobiErrorKey: You have not provided Huobi Api Key
huobiErrorSecret: You have not provided Huobi Secret
incorrectHuobiData: You entered incorrect Huobi Api Key or Huobi Secret
